content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Ah, Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Now, let's talk about the rental price. What is your budget for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate and can accept a lower price. What do you suggest?

I am a student and want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. Please let me know if there is anything else I can provide to you.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Well, Bo Li, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich, I would suggest a rental price of 900 Euros per month. However, I am open to hearing your counteroffer.

As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. That being said, I also want to make sure that my tenants are reliable and responsible, as you have mentioned. If you can provide any additional information or references that would help me verify your creditworthiness, I would be happy to consider them.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a good credit history in China and have paid rent on time in my previous apartments. I can provide references from my previous landlords. How can I provide them to you?
name: Bo Li from China

content:
That's great to hear, Bo Li. It's always a good sign when a tenant has a good credit history and a track record of paying rent on time. I appreciate your willingness to provide references from your previous landlords.

You can provide them to me by email or by sending them to me through a secure online platform. If you prefer, you can also bring them with you when we meet in person. Just let me know what works best for you, and we can arrange it accordingly.
name: Heinrich Heine
